WorkRewardFundType.name: WorkRewardFundType
WorkRewardFundType.description: Represents the type of WorkRewardFund object.

CreditSystem.description: The credit system that is used by the WorkRewardFundType object (gift codes or points). If points are selected, the reward message will not consider the CurrencyCode field.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the WorkRewardFundType

IsActive.description: Whether the WorkRewardFundType is active and available in the UI

IsPredefined.description: Whether the WorkRewardFundType is predefined (true) or not (false)

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this WorkRewardFundType.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this WorkRewardFundType. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the WorkRewardFundType owner

RedemptionDisclaimer.description: The redemption disclaimer text for the WorkRewardFundType

RedemptionUrl.description: The URL thatâ€™s linked to the redemption

UploadCodeColumn.description: The column where the reward code is contained in the CSV file. The upload uses the second value by default.

UploadValueColumn.description: The column where the reward value is contained in the CSV file. The upload uses the third column by default.
